sql: CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS fitnessprofile;
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS fitnessprofile.users (  userID INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,  username VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL,  password VARCHAR(60) NOT NULL,  PRIMARY KEY (userID));

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS fitnessprofile.hydration (  hydrationID INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,  userID INT, hydrationValue DOUBLE(5) NOT NULL,  hydrationDATE DATE(15) NOT NULL,  PRIMARY KEY (hydrationID), CONSTRAINT FK_hydrationUser FOREIGN KEY (userID) REFERENCES users(userID));
